name: beacon-lsp
description: Beacon Language Server - Hindley-Milner type inference for Python
author: Stormlight

beacon.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Beacon language server.

enumDescriptions: Annotation mismatches are hard errors with strict enforcement
Annotation mismatches are diagnostics with quick fixes, but inference proceeds (default)
Annotations supply bounds but can be overridden by inference, very lenient
beacon.typeChecking.mode.description: Type checking strictness mode. Controls how the type checker handles annotation mismatches and inference.

beacon.inlayHints.enable.description: Enable inlay hints for type information.

beacon.inlayHints.variableTypes.description: Show inlay hints for inferred variable types.

beacon.inlayHints.functionReturnTypes.description: Show inlay hints for inferred function return types.

beacon.inlayHints.parameterNames.description: Show inlay hints for parameter names in function calls.

beacon.python.version.description: Target Python version for feature support (e.g., pattern matching in 3.10+, PEP 695 syntax in 3.12+).

beacon.python.interpreterPath.description: Path to Python interpreter for runtime introspection. Leave empty to auto-detect.

beacon.python.stubPaths.description: Additional paths to search for .pyi stub files. Paths can be absolute or relative to the workspace root.

beacon.workspace.sourceRoots.description: Source roots for module resolution (in addition to workspace root). Auto-detected roots include workspace root, src/, and lib/.

beacon.workspace.excludePatterns.description: Patterns to exclude from workspace scanning. Common patterns include venv/, .venv/, __pycache__/, etc.

enumDescriptions: Show unresolved imports as info messages
beacon.diagnostics.unresolvedImports.description: Diagnostic severity level for unresolved imports.

enumDescriptions: Show circular imports as info messages
beacon.diagnostics.circularImports.description: Diagnostic severity level for circular imports.

beacon.formatting.enabled.description: Enable code formatting. When enabled, Beacon will format Python code according to PEP8 conventions.

beacon.formatting.lineLength.description: Maximum line length before wrapping. Default is 88 (Black-compatible).

beacon.formatting.indentSize.description: Number of spaces per indentation level.

enumDescriptions: Add trailing commas to all multi-line structures
Add trailing commas only to multi-line nested structures
beacon.formatting.trailingCommas.description: Trailing comma behavior in multi-line structures.

enumDescriptions: Black formatter compatibility (88 char line length)

beacon.formatting.useTabs.description: Use tabs instead of spaces for indentation (not recommended for Python).

beacon.formatting.normalizeDocstringQuot.description: Normalize quotes in docstrings to match quoteStyle setting.

beacon.formatting.blankLineBeforeClass.description: Add blank lines before class definitions (2 for top-level, 1 for nested).

beacon.formatting.blankLineBeforeFunctio.description: Add blank lines before function definitions (2 for top-level, 1 for methods).

beacon.advanced.maxAnyDepth.description: Maximum depth for Any type propagation before elevating diagnostics. Higher values are more permissive.

beacon.advanced.incremental.description: Enable incremental type checking for faster re-analysis.

beacon.advanced.workspaceAnalysis.description: Enable workspace-wide analysis and cross-file type checking.

beacon.advanced.enableCaching.description: Enable caching of parse trees and type inference results.

beacon.advanced.cacheSize.description: Maximum number of documents to cache for faster analysis.
